title: Celestia Executes $62.5M Token Buyback from Polychain Capital
summary: Celestia is buying back 43.45M TIA tokens from Polychain for $62.5M, with tokens to be redistributed to new investors through rolling unlocks from August 16 to November 14. This represents a significant treasury management move for the modular blockchain project.

title: MARA Raises $850M Through Convertible Notes for Bitcoin Purchases
summary: Marathon Digital (MARA) is raising $850M through zero coupon convertible notes due 2032, with option to upsize by $150M. Approximately $800M will fund additional Bitcoin purchases and general operations, while $50M will repay existing debt obligations.

title: Expanded RICO Lawsuit Targets Solana Ecosystem Over Pump.fun Activities
summary: Burwick Law and Wolf Popper expanded their lawsuit against Pump.fun to include Solana Foundation, Solana Labs, Jito, and key Solana figures. The updated complaint includes RICO charges alleging coordinated misconduct in the meme coin platform's operations across the Solana ecosystem.
